Package org.apache.lucene.codecs.simpletext

Simpletext Codec: writes human readable postings.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
SimpleTextCodec plain text index format.
SimpleTextDocValuesFormat plain text doc values format.
SimpleTextFieldInfosFormat plaintext field infos format
SimpleTextFieldInfosReader reads plaintext field infos files
SimpleTextFieldInfosWriter writes plaintext field infos files
SimpleTextLiveDocsFormat reads/writes plaintext live docs
SimpleTextNormsFormat plain-text norms format.
SimpleTextNormsFormat.SimpleTextNormsConsumer Writes plain-text norms.
SimpleTextNormsFormat.SimpleTextNormsProducer Reads plain-text norms.
SimpleTextPostingsFormat For debugging, curiosity, transparency only!! Do not use this codec in production.
SimpleTextSegmentInfoFormat plain text segments file format.
SimpleTextSegmentInfoReader reads plaintext segments files
SimpleTextSegmentInfoWriter writes plaintext segments files
SimpleTextStoredFieldsFormat plain text stored fields format.
SimpleTextStoredFieldsReader reads plaintext stored fields
SimpleTextStoredFieldsWriter Writes plain-text stored fields.
SimpleTextTermVectorsFormat plain text term vectors format.
SimpleTextTermVectorsReader Reads plain-text term vectors.
SimpleTextTermVectorsWriter Writes plain-text term vectors.
 

Package org.apache.lucene.codecs.simpletext Description

Simpletext Codec: writes human readable postings.
